column2: Send money to §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!. You can choose from 6 different amounts.
§GChoose§! amount of gold to send. The gold amounts you can send are §G25§!, §G50§!, §G100§!, §G200§!, §G500§! or §G1000§!.

Dear §Y[money_receiver.GetFullName]§!, for far too long have I grown powerful while your own realm has stagnated. Please accept this small token of §Y[Root.money_given.GetValue]§! gold coins as reward for still existing. From your biggest rival \nLove §Y[money_giver.GetFullName]§!
